text:
Thanks for the advice, here's hoping there's an upturn in May then! How are you finding it working from home? It's really cool seeing what people are doing now that they have free time- I saw that Fred made a sweet omelette the other day haha.
In regards to treating life like 'rona isn't a thing, that's exactly the plan! 8) We no longer have access to university resources etc,but we do have access to the renderfarm and some free licenses which is awesome. I'm still in my student house, and we've turned the living room into a PC suite so we can keep that work environment going :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
If you have a spare moment I would love to send you everything I'm working on right now and talk about it with you, I'm currently making my final year film which is set to wrap up in May (hopefully!)
Absolutely! Did you have it online and can link it here?

Of course, cheers btw! <https://www.3dhit.co.uk/forums/topic/30031-the-lodge-vfx-short-film/|https://www.3dhit.co.uk/forums/topic/30031-the-lodge-vfx-short-film/> this is the forum thread to our film which is a good way to track how it's happening, and for more direct stuff this is our edit from Feb (skip to roughly 1 minute mark for creature WIP shots) <https://vimeo.com/393792849|https://vimeo.com/393792849> and here's a couple breakdowns of my stuff since working from home (I am responsible for rigging and cfx!)  <https://vimeo.com/404023903|https://vimeo.com/404023903> (password: face)  <https://vimeo.com/403847272|https://vimeo.com/403847272>

attachments.title: THE LODGE - VFX Short Film
attachments.text: THE LODGE (working title) A man at an isolated alien outpost has a conflict of conscience when faced with an intruder. The Lodge is a live-action VFX short featuring a photoreal alien creature. Core Team: Elliott Holland-Crunch - Modelling / Shot-sculpt / Blendshape Will Medcalf - Texture / Lookd...

attachments.title: The Lodge Alpha
attachments.video_html: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/393792849?autoplay=1&app_id=122963" width="400" height="225" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen title="The Lodge Alpha"></iframe>

text:
Since that edit the actual soundtrack/foley has been added, so hopefully that should be coming out soon and it'll be a little bit more polished (at the moment it's 4 different soundtracks mushed together, which doesn't help aha) and there's more animation too (which you can see here!) <https://syncsketch.com/sketch/cbc470c85a37/#1391227/1455031|https://syncsketch.com/sketch/cbc470c85a37/#1391227/1455031>

Any feedback for rigging/cfx would be amazing, I severely underestimated how hard a made up alien creature would be :skull: but also if there's anything that stands out or looks weird from an editing/post perspective please let me know!
